title: Splinter Cell-Pandora Tomorrow
description:
Splinter Cell - Pandora Tomorrow [ENGLISH]


This is not a cracked game. Perfectly legit. I haven't tried the game on Win8 32/64 bit OS. However I have played the game on Win7 x64, but not a 32bit so I can't comment on that. I had issues with running the game in widescreen but its been so long since I've played the game so there may be updates on how to do it. Google it.

Don't forget to patch the game. I included those patches. 


HAVE FUN!!!! AND MORE IMPORTANTLY; SEED THE FUCK OUTTA THIS. There way be some people that don't have this game
